name: part_001
file: tmp_【 #夏色まつり誕生祭2025 】重大告知あり！アイドル革命進行中！～今日の主役は夢の途中～　【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [L-XVS13TRTI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Natsuiro Matsuri performs her original song 'Kimi-kun' on stage during her 2025 birthday live.
Transition period with instrumental music and visual effects.
Natsuiro Matsuri performs 'Gen-eki Idol Chu~' on stage with heart-themed visuals.

subtitles.original: 言葉で　行動で見せるよ
subtitles.english: I'll show you with my words and actions

subtitles.original: 覚悟はいい？
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: 世界一可愛い
subtitles.english: I'm the cutest in the world

subtitles.original: 宇宙一可愛い
subtitles.english: The cutest in the universe

subtitles.original: もっともっと声出して
subtitles.english: Let me hear your voices more and more

subtitles.original: よそ見はダメ　オッケー？
subtitles.english: Don't look away, okay?

subtitles.original: 瞬きも可愛い
subtitles.english: Even my blinks are cute

subtitles.original: 存在が可愛い
subtitles.english: My very existence is cute

subtitles.original: もっともっと聞かせて
subtitles.english: Let me hear you more and more

subtitles.original: ご褒美は...
subtitles.english: The reward is...

subtitles.original: 目ぇ閉じて　チュッ
subtitles.english: Close your eyes... Chu!

subtitles.original: 歌ってくれてサンキュー
subtitles.english: Thank you for singing along

subtitles.original: 笑顔くれてサンキュー
subtitles.english: Thank you for the smiles

subtitles.original: 生きててよかったって思った
subtitles.english: It made me feel so glad to be alive

subtitles.original: ちょっとのミスは愛嬌
subtitles.english: A little mistake is just charm

subtitles.original: だけどやる気は最強
subtitles.english: But my motivation is the strongest

subtitles.original: 競い合って高め合って　全部で行こう
subtitles.english: Let's compete and improve together, let's go with everything we've got

subtitles.original: 苦手ずっと逃げてちゃ　愛は届かないから
subtitles.english: If I keep running away from my weaknesses, love won't reach

subtitles.original: だから何度も何度も挑もう
subtitles.english: So I'll challenge myself over and over again

subtitles.original: 楽しんじゃお！
subtitles.english: Let's have some fun!

subtitles.original: あざとくて可愛い
subtitles.english: I'm calculatedly cute

subtitles.original: 最高に可愛い
subtitles.english: The absolute cutest

subtitles.original: 私だけを笑って
subtitles.english: Smile only for me

subtitles.original: よそ見はダメ　オッケー？
subtitles.english: Don't look away, okay?

subtitles.original: 瞬きも可愛い
subtitles.english: Even my blinks are cute

subtitles.original: 存在が可愛い
subtitles.english: My very existence is cute

subtitles.original: ずっとずっと聞かせて
subtitles.english: Let me hear you forever and ever

subtitles.original: 輝くから
subtitles.english: Because I'll shine

subtitles.original: 約束ね
subtitles.english: It's a promise

subtitles.original: 上手に歌えてるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I'm singing well

subtitles.original: 上手に踊れてるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I'm dancing well

subtitles.original: 間違うの怖くなるけど
subtitles.english: I get scared of making mistakes, but...

subtitles.original: できる　できる　できる　できる　そうだ
subtitles.english: I can do it, I can do it, I can do it, I can do it... That's right

subtitles.original: 信じてくれる人がいる
subtitles.english: There's someone who believes in me

subtitles.original: この歌で君と繋がっていられる
subtitles.english: Through this song, I can stay connected with you

subtitles.original: 忘れられないストーリー描いていこう
subtitles.english: Let's paint an unforgettable story

subtitles.original: 行くよー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 世界一可愛い
subtitles.english: I'm the cutest in the world

subtitles.original: 宇宙一可愛い
subtitles.english: The cutest in the universe

subtitles.original: もっともっと声出して
subtitles.english: Let me hear your voices more and more

subtitles.original: よそ見はダメ　オッケー？
subtitles.english: Don't look away, okay?

subtitles.original: 瞬きも可愛い
subtitles.english: Even my blinks are cute

subtitles.original: 存在が可愛い
subtitles.english: My very existence is cute

subtitles.original: もっともっと聞かせて
subtitles.english: Let me hear you more and more

subtitles.original: ご褒美は...
subtitles.english: The reward is...

subtitles.original: 目ぇ閉じて　チュッ
subtitles.english: Close your eyes... Chu!

subtitles.original: 今日も鏡をチェック　最高の笑顔届ける
subtitles.english: Checking the mirror again today, delivering the best smile

subtitles.original: 才能に甘えないの
subtitles.english: I won't just rely on talent

subtitles.original: 努力が大事や
subtitles.english: Effort is what matters

subtitles.original: お勉強して
subtitles.english: I'll study properly

subtitles.original: お片付けする
subtitles.english: And clean up properly

subtitles.original: 正体は私はそうアイドルだもん
subtitles.english: In truth, I'm an idol after all

subtitles.original: 好きなタイプは私　大好きでマジ一途な人
subtitles.english: My type is someone who loves me and is seriously devoted

subtitles.original: ぴったりの君だけど
subtitles.english: You're a perfect match

subtitles.original: 今はじゃない目ぇ閉じて
subtitles.english: But not right now, close your eyes

subtitles.original: 理想はもっと大人だけど　君だけのものに
subtitles.english: My ideals are even more mature, but to be only yours...

subtitles.original: なれないの　あぁごめん
subtitles.english: ...I can't, ah, sorry

subtitles.original: いつまでも好きでいて　約束よ
subtitles.english: Keep loving me forever, it's a promise

subtitles.original: わがままな御願いね　みんなのものでいたい
subtitles.english: It's a selfish request, I want to belong to everyone

subtitles.original: それでも私のこと好きですか？
subtitles.english: Even so, do you still love me?

subtitles.original: ピンク色のフリフリ　スポットライト浴びて
subtitles.english: Pink frills, bathed in the spotlight

subtitles.original: いつかきっとね　君だけの私に
subtitles.english: One day, surely, I'll be only yours

subtitles.original: 今はまだ歌いたい
subtitles.english: For now, I still want to sing

subtitles.original: 現役アイドル中
subtitles.english: Currently an active idol
